notes: [Improved] Updated to take advantage of new Craft 2.5 plugin features.
[Improved] The plugin now creates separate named anchor elements that are placed before the headings, rather than adding an `id` attribute to the headings.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where non-breaking spaces within headings could result in named anchors with “nbsp” in the name.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the plugin could incorrectly parse header tags in some HTML snippets.
